member.name: CRYPT_PKCS12_PBE_PARAMS
member.summary: The CRYPT_PKCS12_PBE_PARAMS structure contains parameters used to create an encryption key, initialization vector (IV), or Message Authentication Code (MAC) key for a PKCS #12 password based encryption algorithm.

member.name: CRYPT_PKCS12_PBE_PARAMS.iIterations
member.summary: An integer that specifies the number of hashes of the password and salt that are used to create the key.

member.name: CRYPT_PKCS12_PBE_PARAMS.cbSalt
member.summary: An integer that specifies the size, in bytes, of the salt used to create the key.
